Package fr.ferret.model.state

Class PublishingStateProcessus<T>

java.lang.Object
fr.ferret.model.state.PublishingStateProcessus<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneConversion, VariantConversion, VcfExport
public abstract class PublishingStateProcessus<T> extends Object
Extend this class if your class need to publish the state of its processus
